item.title: A Matter of Survival as South Asiaâ€™s Heat Wave Reaches 127 Degrees
item.description: Fahrenheit The heat wave that has been sweeping across South Asia has reached its peak, with temperatures in Pakistan and India reaching 127 degrees Fahrenheit (53 degrees Celsius) in some areas.
